DOC.detailed_description: In prospective , open , not-randomized , control single-center pilot study 80 patient in-stent-thrombosis ( 40 sub-acute thromboses ( SAT ) , 40 late thromboses ( LT ) ) control group 80 patient develop thrombosis compare . The aim study establishment diagnostic marker vor prediction SAT ( detection CD39- CD73-activity , respectively ) LT ( EPC-number function , respectively ) correspondingly aim early identification patient high risk develop in-stent-thrombosis .
DOC.criteria: patient develop SAT LT stent implantation use PTCA instabel coronary heart disease , systemic autoimmune disease , rheumatic disease , tumor , impaired kidney liver function , surgery within last 3 month , pregnant lactating woman
